questions_nl.feedback: In Nederland ben je niet verplicht om tijdens de wintermaanden daadwerkelijk winterbanden onder jouw voertuig te hebben.

questions_nl.question: Is een airbag verplicht?
questions_nl.feedback: De meeste nieuwe autoâs hebben ze echter wel.

questions_nl.question: Mag je een blaastest weigeren vanuit een geloofsovertuiging?
questions_nl.feedback: Ongeacht jouw geloof, moet je een blaastest doen wanneer de politie jou daartoe vordert. Je kunt wel vanwege bv. een kaakoperatie de blaastest weigeren omdat je niet kunt blazen. Dan moet je meewerken om je alsnog te laten testen (via het bloed of urine).

questions_nl.question: Wat is de juiste volgorde?
questions_nl.feedback: De tram is al voorbij de haaientanden en moet nu het kruispunt oversteken voordat de motor mag rijden.

questions_nl.question: Je hebt motorproblemen. Is dit een veilige plaats om als persoon te wachten?
questions_nl.feedback: Voor de veiligheid is het raadzaam om achter de vangrail te wachten, wanneer je je op de vluchtstrook bevindt.

questions_nl.question: Je sleept een motorfiets met zijspan, mag dat?
questions_nl.feedback: Een voertuig met meer dan 2 wielen mag gesleept worden.

questions_nl.question: Je wilt rechtsaf. Moet je de fietser voor laten gaan?
questions_nl.feedback: De fietser gaat rechtdoor, jij slaat rechtsaf. De fietser heeft dus voorrang.

questions_nl.question: Moet je hier voorrang verlenen?
questions_nl.feedback: Een scootmobiel moet de regels volgen van het deel van de weg waar deze zich bevindt, dus op de stoep is deze een voetganger. Deze krijgt daarom geen voorrang. Een scootmobiel valt onder een gehandicaptenvoertuig en niet als iemand die slecht ter been is.

questions_nl.question: Aan welke kant zit het groene licht (groene doorschijnende kap over koplamp) van het laatste voertuig van een militaire kolonne?
questions_nl.feedback: De laatste auto van een militaire colonne heeft 1 groen licht aan de rechterkant.

questions_nl.question: Je ziet dit bord. Wat kun je het beste doen als je op de 2e rijstrook rijdt?
questions_nl.feedback: Als je op dezelfde rijstrook blijft rijden dan bots je in het verkeer dat op de doorgaande rijstrook rijdt. Hierdoor kun je beter de rechterrijstrook nemen waardoor het veiliger is voor het andere verkeer om in te voegen.
options: Wissel naar de linkerrijstrook om plaats te maken voor het andere verkeer

questions_nl.question: Je wilt hier links afslaan. Sorteer je zo correct voor?
questions_nl.feedback: Dit is correct, zo kunnen fietsers en overig verkeer er nog langs via de rechterkant.

questions_nl.question: Wat weet je over dit voertuig wanneer je deze wilt inhalen?
questions_nl.feedback: Dit zie je aan de markeringen achter op de vrachtwagen.
options: Dit voertuig is erg lang, daarom moet ik de afstand om in te halen goed inschatten
Dit voertuig trekt veel langzamer op dan mijn voertuig, dit maakt inhalen gemakkelijker

questions_nl.question: Wat gebeurt er met de middelpuntvliedende kracht (centrifugale kracht) wanneer je jouw snelheid verdubbelt?
questions_nl.feedback: De centrifugale kracht verviervoudigt wanneer je je snelheid verdubbelt.

questions_nl.question: Mag je hier parkeren?
questions_nl.feedback: Het is verboden om op de berm van een autoweg te parkeren.

questions_nl.question: Moet een gekoppelde aanhangwagen verlichting voeren?
questions_nl.feedback: Gekoppelde aanhangwagens moeten bij dag, indien het zicht ernstig wordt belemmerd, en bij nacht, achterlicht en verlichting van de achterkentekenplaat hebben.

questions_nl.question: Mag je rijden zonder kentekenplaat verlichting?
questions_nl.feedback: Aan de voor- en achterkant van autoâs en motoren moet een rechthoekige kentekenplaat zijn bevestigd. De kentekenplaat aan de achterkant van de auto en/of motor moet worden verlicht als de verlichting van het voertuig brandt.

questions_nl.question: Jouw auto en aanhangwagen zijn 7 meter lang. Mag je hier rechtdoor rijden?
questions_nl.feedback: Ja, deze weg is alleen verboden voor vrachtwagens. Hoe lang het ook is, een auto met een aanhangwagen is nog steeds geen vrachtwagen.

questions_nl.question: Het verkeerslicht is groen, maar er kruisen jou nog steeds voertuigen. Volg je het groene licht op?
questions_nl.feedback: Voor de algehele veiligheid, stop je en wacht je totdat het kruispunt vrij is en je ongehinderd kunt verder rijden. Ook al heb je voorrang, je moet het alleen nemen als het hier veilig genoeg voor is.

questions_nl.question: Mag je op een verdrijvingsvlak rijden wanneer de spitsstrook gesloten is?
questions_nl.feedback: Je mag niet op een verdrijvingsvlak rijden.

questions_nl.question: Mogen autoâs of autoâs met aanhanger die samen langer zijn dan 7 meter gebruik maken van de meest linkerrijstrook op de autosnelweg?
questions_nl.feedback: Van de derde rijstrook mag geen gebruik gemaakt worden door vrachtautoâs en motorvoertuigen met een aanhangwagen die langer zijn dan 7 meter. Een uitzondering hierop is wanneer je gaat voorsorteren.

questions_nl.question: Als je aan het rijden bent, verschijnt dit symbool op je dashboard. Wat betekent dit?
questions_nl.feedback: Wanneer dit symbool rood brandt, kan er iets mis zijn met bv. de dynamo. Laat dit zo snel mogelijk controleren of koop vast startkabels, je gaat ze nodig hebben!
options: Elektrisch probleem in de motor van de auto

questions_nl.question: Moet je in nieuwere touringcars een gordel dragen als die aanwezig zijn?
questions_nl.feedback: Als de gordels aanwezig zijn, ben je verplicht die te dragen

questions_nl.question: Wat is de maximale toegestane promillage voor een beginnend bestuurder om in zijn bloed te hebben?
questions_nl.feedback: De maximale toegestane promillage voor beginnende bestuurders is 0,2 promille. Bij een blaastest komt dit neer op 88 Âµg alcohol per liter uitgeblazen adem.

questions_nl.question: Wie mag hier als eerste?
Een auto wilt een uitrit uitrijden en naar links afslaan, jij komt voor je medeweggebruiker van links en wilt diezelfde uitrit inrijden. Wie heeft er voorrang?
questions_nl.feedback: De bestuurder die vanuit een uitrit komt moet voorrang verlenen, maar voor de doorstroming is het vaak wel weer handiger om eerst diegene eruit te laten. Communicatie onderling is dus heel belangrijk.

questions_nl.question: Waar bevind je je?
questions_nl.feedback: Wanneer een voorrangsbord na het kruispunt is geplaatst, dan bevind je je buiten de bebouwde kom.

questions_nl.question: Wie gaat er voor?
questions_nl.feedback: Blinden met een witte stok met 1 of meer rode ringen die aangeven over te willen steken, moet je voor laten gaan.

questions_nl.question: Wie gaat er eerst?
questions_nl.feedback: Je rijd op een voorrangsweg, daarom mag jij als eerste.

questions_nl.question: Je wilt de autosnelweg verlaten. Waar moet je te allen tijde rekening mee houden?
questions_nl.feedback: De snelheid minder je zoveel mogelijk op de uitvoegstrook en niet op de doorgaande weg. Let op! Niet elke uitvoegstrook is hetzelfde en je hebt daarom niet altijd even lang de tijd om snelheid te minderen.
options: Je moet zoveel mogelijk snelheid minderen op de uitvoegstrook
Je moet zoveel mogelijk snelheid minderen op de doorgaande weg

questions_nl.question: Mag je wisselen naar de linkerrijstrook?
questions_nl.feedback: Er is nog voldoende ruimte na de blokmarkering dus dit mag.

questions_nl.question: Mag hier worden ingehaald?
questions_nl.feedback: Bij nadering zebrapad mag je niet inhalen.

questions_nl.question: Welke informatie kun je vinden op een hectometerpaaltje?
questions_nl.feedback: Op een hectometerpaaltje kun je het routenummer, het deel van de weg, de kilometeraanduiding en de maximumsnelheid vinden. De maximumsnelheid wordt soms echter achterwege gelaten.

questions_nl.question: Mag je parkeren op de rijbaan/wegkant van een voorrangsweg binnen de bebouwde kom?
questions_nl.feedback: Als er niet expliciet een verbod is aangegeven of als je geen gevaar of hinder veroorzaakt, mag je daar gewoon parkeren.

questions_nl.question: Welk signaal geef je aan het overige verkeer als je geparkeerd staat met pech?
questions_nl.feedback: Je zet pas een gevarendriehoek neer als je je alarmlichten aan hebt, die zijn verplicht.
options: Je zet de richtingaanwijzer aan naar links en rechts

questions_nl.question: Mag je parkeerlichten aanzetten buiten de bebouwde kom?
questions_nl.feedback: Dit is zelfs verplicht bij het parkeren.

questions_nl.question: Je reed net door het groene licht zonder te stoppen. Mag dat?
questions_nl.feedback: Ja, dat mag. Een verkeerslicht gaat boven borden of tekens op de weg, daarom geldt het bord niet als het verkeerslicht werkt. Mocht het verkeerslicht echter kapot zijn of uit staan dan moet je je wel houden aan de regels die je opgelegd worden door middel van de aangegeven borden of tekens op de weg.

questions_nl.question: Mag je op een busstrook stoppen?
questions_nl.feedback: Je mag niet stil staan op of naast weggedeelten die bedoeld zijn voor een ander soort weggebruikers, zoals bussen. Een busstrook is bedoeld voor alle bussen, inclusief lijnbussen.

questions_nl.question: Ik sta op een voorsorteerstrook naar links, maar ik wil naar rechts. Mag ik nog veranderen van rijstrook?
questions_nl.feedback: Wanneer je voorgesorteerd staat mag je niet meer van richting veranderen.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 80 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: Je rijdt op een hoge snelheid en de bestuurder voor je remt. Rem flink af om een aanrijding te voorkomen.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 80 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: Je rijdt erg dicht op jouw voorganger, laat daarom het gas los voor een veilige volgafstand.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 80 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: Je hebt duidelijk zicht op de weg en je rijdt niet te hard. Je wordt wel gewaarschuwd voor laagvliegende vliegtuigen.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 120 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: Je houdt voldoende afstand tot de bestuurder voor je. Let wel op: het is druk op de weg.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 35 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: Aan jouw beide kanten bevinden zich obstakels: er rijdt een auto dicht naast je en er staat een vuilnisbak rechts. Er is geen ruimte om uit te wijken. Je nadert ook een splitsing: rem af voordat de bocht neemt.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 100 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: Er is voldoende zicht op de weg en je houdt een ruime volgafstand, er is geen reden om in te grijpen.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 120 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: Je houdt voldoende volgafstand en je hebt een goed zicht op de weg.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 55 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: Het verkeerslicht is groen, maar er rijdt nog iemand op het kruispunt. Je rijdt met een te hoge snelheid om af te slaan: rem voordat je de bocht neemt. Let ook op de bestuurder naast je.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 120 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: Rem om te voorkomen dat de volgafstand te klein wordt en je op de bestuurders voor je botst. Let op de autoâs die zich willen verplaatsen naar de andere rijstroken.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 100 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: Je nadert een autoweg, maar deze begint met een gevaarlijke scherpe bocht en de bestuurders voor je remmen af. Rem flink af om de bocht veilig te kunnen nemen.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 120 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: Het is erg druk op de weg, zorg daarom voor voldoende volgafstand.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 120 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: De bestuurder voor je gaat zich verplaatsen naar de linkerrijstrook, omdat bestuurders van rechts gaan invoegen. Wees voorbereid om ook plaats te maken voor de invoegende bestuurders.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 80 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: Je hebt een duidelijk overzicht op de weg en er rijdt niemand achter, rem en vogels zullen waarschijnlijk wegvliegen zodra de auto nadert. Gas loslaten geeft de vogels misschien te weinig tijd om weg te vliegen.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 120 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: Jouw rijstrook is vrij, maar de linkerrijstrook is druk. Je kan de situatie maar deels overzien. Laat het gas even los om deze situatie met enige voorzichtigheid te benaderen.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 120 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: De bestuurder naast je wilt plots invoegen op jouw rijstrook, maar deze houdt geen veilige afstand. Rem om een aanrijding te voorkomen.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 50 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: Je hebt een goed overzicht op de weg en er zijn geen verkeersdeelnemers te bekennen. Je kunt op deze snelheid blijven rijden.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 120 km/u. Het overige verkeer heeft dezelfde snelheid. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: Wanneer de bestuurder op de linkerrijstrook gaat invoegen naar jouw rijstrook, is er geen veilige afstand meer. Met 120 km/u is dit een zeer onveilige situatie. Rem om de volgafstand fiks te vergroten.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 80 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: Er zijn wegwerkzaamheden; de linkerrijstrook gaat eindigen. Er zijn echter geen snelheidsbeperkingen en er is geen direct gevaar, dus je kan dezelfde snelheid behouden.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 30 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: 30 km/u is een veilige snelheid op deze weg. Er dreigt geen direct gevaar.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 120 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: Je hebt een goed zicht op de weg. Er dreigt geen direct gevaar.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 20 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: Een voetganger steekt de weg over, laat deze veilig oversteken. Er nadert ook een rotonde, waar je voorrang moet verlenen.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 120 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: Je rijdt op een invoegstrook waar je snelheid moet maken, maar de auto voor je rijdt dicht op zijn voorganger. Voorkom dat je te dichtbij komt.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 80 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: Je wordt ingehaald. Laat de auto zijn inhaalmanoeuvre afmaken en laat het gas los, zodat hij tijdig kan invoegen op jouw rijstrook, want er komen tegenliggers aan.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 120 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: Je houdt voldoende afstand. Blijf wel opletten, want het wordt drukker op de weg.

questions_nl.question: Je rijdt 120 km/u. Wat doe je?
questions_nl.feedback: De bestuurders op de rijbaan zijn aan het remmen. Er is iets gebeurd: rem, want je nadert met een hoge snelheid.

questions_nl.question: Welke aanhanger weegt minder dan 750 kg en heeft de kentekenplaat van de auto?
questions_nl.feedback: De aanhanger of met de witte kentekenplaat is een kopie van de gele kentekenplaat van de auto. De gele kentekenplaat op de aanhanger is een ander nummer dan de kentekenplaat van de auto, dit betekent dus dat deze meer dan 750 kilo weegt.

questions_nl.question: Waartoe dienen de groene en blauwe strepen op een nieuwe band?
questions_nl.feedback: Zodra er met de banden gereden wordt verdwijnen de kleurstrepen van de band en weet je dat de band eerder is gebruikt.
options: Om te laten zien dat de band nieuw is
Om de draairichting van de band aan te geven
Om de linker of rechterkant duidelijk te maken voor de garage

questions_nl.question: Een kind is kleiner dan 1,35 meter en draagt een heupgordel, mag dit?
questions_nl.feedback: Een heupgordel is niet toegestaan en wanneer het kind kleiner is dan 1,35 meter. Deze moet dan van een goedgekeurd kinderstoeltje of zitje gebruikmaken.

questions_nl.question: Wat moet je volgen als je als ervaren bestuurder teveel alcohol (tussen 0,8 en 1,0 promille) hebt gedronken en de politie houdt je aan?
questions_nl.feedback: Als je als ervaren bestuurder bestrapt wordt op het rijden met tussen de 0,8 en 1,0 promille alcohol in je bloed dan wordt je verplicht een LEMA (Lichte Educatieve Maatregel Alcohol) te volgen.

questions_nl.question: Wat is de juiste volgorde?
questions_nl.feedback: Rechtdoor op dezelfde weg gaat voor, daarom mag de auto eerst in deze situatie.

questions_nl.question: De bestuurder links verleent geen voorrang aan jou. Steek je nog steeds het kruispunt over?
questions_nl.feedback: Wanneer je wel voorrang hebt, maar dit niet krijgt, is het aan jou om een ongeluk te voorkomen. Dus ook al heb je eigenlijk voorrang, als er verkeer voordringt, betekent dat niet dat jij nu tegen iemand aan mag rijden. De andere bestuurder moet voorrang verlenen en jij mag geen voorrang nemen.

questions_nl.question: Moet je voetgangers voor laten gaan wanneer ze willen uitstappen?
questions_nl.feedback: Je moet de voetgangers voor laten gaan. De voetgangers hebben namelijk geen platform om op te wachten. Als deze voetgangers wel een platform hadden gehad, dan hoefde je ze niet voor te laten gaan.

questions_nl.question: Mag je hier stilstaan om te laden en lossen?
questions_nl.feedback:
Op een tramspoor dat deel is van dezelfde weg waar andere bestuurders ook mogen rijden, mag je stilstaan om te laden of lossen. De gele streep op de stoep is onderbroken, hier mag je dus stoppen. 

Op een apart weggedeelte voor de tram mag je niet stilstaan!

questions_nl.question: Geef je de bus voorrang?
questions_nl.feedback: Wanneer een bus aangeeft te willen wegrijden van een bushalte buiten de bebouwde kom, dan hoef je deze geen voorrang te verlenen.

questions_nl.question: Waar rijdt een brommobiel in een normale situatie?
questions_nl.feedback: Als er een rijbaan aanwezig is, dan moet een brommobiel daar op rijden. In

questions_nl.question: Je haalt hier in, mag dat?
questions_nl.feedback: Bij een onderbroken streep mag je elk voertuig inhalen.

questions_nl.question: Hoe hard mag een bestelauto op de snelweg rijden met een aanhangwagen (totale gewicht 3000kg)?
questions_nl.feedback: De maximumsnelheid van een auto met aanhangwagen op de snelweg is 90km/u.

questions_nl.question: Mag je hier stoppen?
questions_nl.feedback: De gele doorgetrokken streep geldt voor de andere kant van de weg, dit mag dus. Tegen het verkeer in stoppen aan de andere kant van de weg mag ook.

questions_nl.question: Je wilt de afslag nemen. Moet je richting aangeven?
questions_nl.feedback: Om aan het overige verkeer duidelijk te maken dat je echt van plan bent om de afslag te nemen, geef je richting aan naar rechts. Zo weet het overige verkeer dat jij niet van plan bent om weer in te voegen op de doorgaande rijbaan.

questions_nl.question: Moeten ruiters ook voor- en achterlicht voeren?
questions_nl.feedback: Een lamp met een rood licht moet naar achteren stralen en een wit of geel licht naar voren stralen.

questions_nl.question: Bij welk bord moet je voorrang verlenen aan tegemoetkomende bestuurders?
questions_nl.feedback:
Dit is te zien aan de kleuren van de pijlen. Als de pijl naar boven rood is dan heb je geen voorrang

Als de pijl naar boven wit is, dan wel.

questions_nl.question: De militaire colonne is de kruising aan het oversteken. Het eerste voertuig is al op de kruising, en de volgauto's rijden door rood. Moet je nu voorrang verlenen?
questions_nl.feedback: Wanneer een militaire colonne begonnen is met rijden door het groene licht en het wordt rood, mogen ze door rood rijden. Jij mag dat niet en moet dus voorrang verlenen

questions_nl.question: Mag je op een verdrijvingsvlak rijden wanneer de spitsstrook open is?
questions_nl.feedback: In het algemeen mag je van een verdrijvingsvlak geen gebruik maken, tenzij je een spitsstrook volgt, waarbij er een samenvoeging van wegen is.

questions_nl.question: Vanaf hoeveel kilo moet een aanhanger een eigen kentekenplaat hebben?
questions_nl.feedback: Wanneer de aanhanger zwaarder is dan 750 kg, dient deze een eigen kentekenplaat te hebben, dus een andere kentekenplaat dan de auto.

questions_nl.question: Je hebt een oude auto die op benzine rijdt. Hoe vaak moet je deze APK laten keuren?
questions_nl.feedback: Een oude benzineauto (ouder dan 8 jaar) moet je elk jaar APK laten keuren.

questions_nl.question: Is een gordel die pluist toegestaan?
questions_nl.feedback: Een gordel die pluist is officieel niet beschadigd.

questions_nl.question: Pleegt een beginnend bestuurder een misdrijf wanneer deze een motorvoertuig bestuurt, met een adem-alcoholgehalte hoger dan 0,2 promille?
questions_nl.feedback: Een adem-alcoholgehalte hoger dan 0,2 promille wordt bij een beginnend bestuurder als een misdrijf gezien.

questions_nl.question: Je stopt hier om iemand in te laten stappen, mag dat?
questions_nl.feedback: Nee, je mag niet stil staan vlak voor of na een kruising.

questions_nl.question: Moet je de voetgangers voor laten gaan?
questions_nl.feedback: Wanneer ze de tram uitstappen kunnen de voetgangers nog veilig op het platform wachten, daarom hoef je ze geen voorrang te geven.
options: Nee, ze kunnen veilig op het platform wachten.

questions_nl.question: Een bus wilt wegrijden binnen de bebouwde kom. Moet een rouwstoet de bus voor laten gaan?
questions_nl.feedback: Een rouwstoet heeft voorrang t.o.v. een autobus die van een bushalte binnen de bebouwde wil wegrijden.

questions_nl.question: Mag je hier uitladen?
questions_nl.feedback: Bij een bushalte mag je niet laden of lossen. Je mag alleen een passagier in- of uit laten stappen.

questions_nl.question: Mag je stilstaan op een fietssuggestiestrook?
questions_nl.feedback: Een suggestiestrook is een deel van de rijbaan dat ook bedoeld is voor motorvoertuigen. Je mag hier dus gewoon op stil staan, parkeren en rijden.

questions_nl.question: Je wilt wisselen naar de linker rijstrook. Mag dat?
questions_nl.feedback: Ook al zijn de strepen vervaagt of versleten, zijn ze nog steeds geldig. Je mag hier dus niet wisselen van baan.

questions_nl.question: Hoe hard mag een gehandicaptenvoertuig (met motor) rijden op het voetpad?
questions_nl.feedback: Met een gehandicaptenvoertuig, met of zonder motor, op een voetpad mag u maximaal 6 km/u.

questions_nl.question: Mag je in een tunnel parkeren?
questions_nl.feedback: Het is verboden te stoppen en parkeren in een tunnel.

questions_nl.question: Mag je jouw vrienden begroeten met een lichtsignaal?
questions_nl.feedback: Dit mag alleen om aan te geven dat er gevaar dreigt.

questions_nl.question: Moet de kentekenplaat van een gekoppelde aanhangwagen verlicht zijn âs nachts?
questions_nl.feedback: Ook de kentekenplaat van een gekoppelde aanhangwagen is verplicht om zichtbaar te zijn, deze moet dus ook verlicht worden als de lampen van de aanhangwagen branden.

questions_nl.question: Geldt deze waarschuwing alleen als de weg nat is?
questions_nl.feedback: Deze waarschuwing geldt altijd, tenzij er een onderbord onder zit dat iets anders aangeeft.

questions_nl.question: Wie krijgt een stopteken?
questions_nl.feedback: Het verkeer van achter de agent wordt als het ware tegengehouden door zijn opgestoken arm. Het verkeer van achter de agent moet dus stoppen.
options: Verkeer dat de verkeersagent van achteren nadert
Verkeer dat de verkeersagent van voren nadert
Verkeer dat de verkeersagent van links nadert

questions_nl.question:
Er is geen âSTOPâ bord aanwezig.
Moet ik stoppen voor deze streep?
questions_nl.feedback: Stopstrepen gaan altijd samen met een stopteken. Mocht dit om een bepaalde reden toch niet het geval zijn, dan ben je nog steeds verplicht voor de stopstreep te stoppen.

questions_nl.question: Moet een fietsendrager een kentekenplaat hebben?
questions_nl.feedback: Een fietsendrager moet ook een (witte) kentekenplaat hebben (kopie van de auto). Het kenteken van de auto is anders niet goed zichtbaar.

questions_nl.question: Moet een auto APK gekeurd zijn wanneer je ermee de weg op gaat?
questions_nl.feedback: Wanneer het tijd is om een auto APK te laten keuren, ben je verplicht dat te doen. Een auto moet altijd APK gekeurd zijn voordat je ermee op de openbare weg gaat rijden.

questions_nl.question: Ben je onder invloed na het drinken van een Bacardi Breezer?
questions_nl.feedback: Na een slokje alcohol ben je al onder invloed. Het maakt niet uit wat voor drankje dat dan is.

questions_nl.question: Wie moet er voor gaan?
questions_nl.feedback: Voetgangers op dezelfde weg die rechtdoor gaan, moet je voor laten gaan.

questions_nl.question: Het eerste voertuig van de rouwstoet nadert jou van links. Wie gaat er voor?
questions_nl.feedback: Het eerste voertuig heeft zich aan de gewone verkeersregels te houden. Aangezien jij in deze situatie van rechts komt, ga jij dus voor.

questions_en.question: You're driving 40 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: The sign warns of a crossing for cyclists and mopeds. The turn you are about to take is reasonably uncluttered: you see the oncoming traffic. The maximum speed is 30 km/h, while you are driving 40 km/h, which is why you let go of the gas.

questions_en.question: You're driving 30 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: The car is taking the turn and will probably end up on the wrong side of the road. You let go of the gas; that way you can keep driving, but be prepared for a following action. Indeed, you are also approaching a pedestrian crossing.

questions_en.question: You're driving 30 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: There is no direct danger, you have an overview of the situation and it is safe.

questions_en.question: You're driving 30 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: 30 km/h is a safe speed on this road. There is no direct danger.

questions_en.question: You're driving 30 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: The vehicle ahead of you is braking. It is a cluttered point: the trees block your view. Brake to prevent getting to close to the car in front of you.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: You have a clear overview and your following distance is ample.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: You are driving on a motorway with enough distance to the vehicle in front of you. It is not busy on the road.

questions_en.question: You're driving 90 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: The truck in front of you can only drive 80 km/h, causing a difference in speed. Also, the left lane is ending and the truck is blocking your view. You cannot see what is happening in front of the truck. Watch for any merging / overtaking cars.

questions_en.question: You're driving 30 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: You are driving on the tram tracks and a vehicle is approaching from the other direction.

questions_en.question: You're driving 30 km/h. What do you do?

questions_en.question: You're driving 30 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: The traffic light is red. Brake to stop.

questions_en.question: You're driving 30 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: You are driving onto a roundabout with drivers in front of you. Brake until the road is free and you are able to continue.

questions_en.question: You're driving 15 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: Brake to make sure you stop in time for the red traffic light.

questions_en.question: You're driving 30 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: The traffic light is green.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: It is busy on the road; the drivers in front of you brake. Keep sufficient distance, so brake.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: You are maintaining enough distance. Do watch out, you see lights on in the distance.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: It is busy on the road and you are driving at high speed. Let go of the gas to approach this situation.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: The drivers in front of you are braking. Brake to assess the situation at a lower speed.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: Your lane is free, but the left lane is crowded. You can only partly oversee the situation. Let go of the gas for a moment to approach this situation with some care.

questions_en.question: You're driving 50 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: The matrix signs indicate a speed limit of '50 km/h'. You are maintaining enough distance to the person in front of you.

questions_en.question: You're driving 70 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: The matrix signs indicate a speed limit of '50 km/h'. Adjust your speed and be prepared for a traffic jam or other event.

questions_en.question: You're driving 50 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: The intersection is blocked. Brake to avoid hitting or blocking other drivers because you are standing still in the middle of the intersection.

questions_en.question: You're driving 50 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: You are approaching a dangerous intersection and driving closely to the person in front of you. Brake to approach the situation at an adjusted speed.

questions_en.question: You're driving 50 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: You are maintaining enough following distance to react in time.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: It is busy on the road: all lanes are open. Take entering and exiting drivers into account, they might cross your path.

questions_en.question: You're driving 30 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: Approach this situation at low speed. People could suddenly appear from behind cars, or drivers might leave their parking spaces. Also take note of the car in front of you, which is braking.

questions_en.question: You're driving 130 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: You are approaching a split in the motorway. Be prepared to act, for example if drivers want to merge from the right. You cannot completely oversee the situation.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: You are driving very close to the person in front of you. There is little room to swerve. Brake to significantly increase the following distance.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: You are merging, but there are roadworks. Pass them at a lower speed and only start merging when there is enough room.

questions_en.question: You're driving 40 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: An agricultural vehicle has a maximum speed of 25 km/h. You cannot overtake anyone here, brake to avoid a collision.

questions_en.question: You're driving 100 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: There are roadworks. Watch for drivers who might cut you off when moving to your lane.

questions_en.question: You're driving 100 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: You are approaching an autoweg, but it starts with a dangerous sharp turn and the drivers in front of you are braking. Brake strongly to safely take the turn.

questions_en.question: You're driving 100 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: The road is full of braking drivers. Brake to create a safe following distance.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: The road in front of you is not free. Make sure to create enough room and be alert so you can react in time if, for example, drivers next to you want to merge.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: The road in front of you is free. You have no reason to reduce your speed.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: Watch the driver next to you, who wants to move to your lane.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: You are maintaining enough following distance and have a good view of the road.

questions_en.question: You're driving 30 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: You are driving at a low speed. There is no danger, so calmly keep on driving.

questions_en.question: You're driving 25 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: You need to give priority to the driver from the right. Watch out, there is no room to swerve, because there are trees and parked cars next to you.

questions_en.question: You're driving 30 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: The driver in front of you is driving onto your side of the road. You have no room to swerve. A van is parked on the other side.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: The matrix signs indicate a speed limit of 70 km/h. You are driving very fast: adjust your speed to avoid dangerous situations.

questions_en.question: You're driving 90 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: The matrix signs indicate a speed limit of 70 km/h. Adjust your speed: you are driving too fast.

questions_en.question: You're driving 70 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: The matrix signs indicate a speed limit of 70 km/h. You can keep following the road. Do watch the speed difference between the other lanes.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: It is very busy on the road, so adjust your speed. Give drivers that want to enter the road space and make sure you keep enough distance.

questions_en.question: You're driving 130 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: You are approaching a tunnel. Give your eyes time to adjust to the dark at this high speed.

questions_en.question: You're driving 100 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: The car in front of you does not maintain enough distance while merging. Increase the following distance. You are driving in a tunnel: this is very dangerous because you cannot swerve.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: You have a good view of the road and are maintaining a safe following distance.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: There is no danger. Let the traffic flow through and do not unnecessarily reduce your speed.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: If the driver on the left lane is going to merge onto your lane, there will no longer be a safe distance. This is a very unsafe situation at 120 km/h. Brake to significantly increase the following distance.

questions_en.question: You're driving 30 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: The driver in front of you is braking, you have no view of the road in front of you and a (partially) handicapped pedestrian wants to cross: so, brake!

questions_en.question: You're driving 30 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: A movement-impaired pedestrian is about to cross. You need to let them go first.

questions_en.question: You're driving 20 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: Someone walking with a bicycle is a pedestrian, so give them the opportunity to safely cross the zebra crossing.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: You have a good view of the road and there is enough distance to the other traffic.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: There is no room to swerve to the left or right. You are approaching a car with a trailer: they are only allowed to go 90 km/h.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: You are going through a bend and it is busy on the left lane. Watch out for drivers who want to enter/exit next to you.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: Make sure there is enough distance between you and the driver who is going to move to your lane.

questions_en.question: You're driving 90 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: The matrix signs indicate a speed limit of '50 km/h'. Adjust your speed!

questions_en.question: You're driving 50 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: The matrix signs indicate a speed limit of '50 km/h'. You are maintaining the correct speed. Do keep an eye on the busy traffic.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: You have a good view of the road, there is no reason to act.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: Make sure there is enough distance between you and the driver who is going to move to your lane.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: This is a dangerous situation: the driver in front of you is braking and the truck is blocking your view of the road. There is no room to swerve.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: A 70 km/h speed limit is indicated when making this sharp turn. So, greatly adjust your speed. There is a truck driving next to you, so you do not have any room to swerve.

questions_en.question: You're driving 70 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: A 70 km/h speed limit is indicated when making this sharp turn. Watch the truck next to you and maintain sufficient distance to the person in front of you.

questions_en.question: You're driving 70 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: A 70 km/h speed limit is indicated when making this sharp turn. Watch the truck next to you and maintain sufficient distance to the person in front of you. The "You are driving too fast" signs are lighting up. Release the gas for a moment.

questions_en.question: You're driving 120 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: You are maintaining enough distance. Do stay alert, because it is getting busier on the road.

questions_en.question: You're driving 60 km/h. What do you do?
questions_en.feedback: You are driving onto a busy intersection at 60 km/h. This is very dangerous. Make sure you do not block the intersection and brake to avoid hitting the person in front of you.

Note! You have priority on this road. Thus, all drivers coming from the left or right need to give you right of way.
options: You are on a priority road

Note! You have priority on the coming intersection. Thus, all drivers coming from the left or right need to give you right of way.
options: You are approaching a priority intersection, you have priority

questions_en.feedback: Note! You have priority on the coming intersection. Thus, all drivers coming from the left need to give you right of way.
options: You are approaching a priority intersection with a road from the left, you have priority

questions_en.feedback: Note! You have priority on the coming intersection. Thus, all drivers coming from the right need to give you right of way.
options: You are approaching a priority intersection with a road from the right, you have priority

questions_en.feedback: Note! You are now driving onto a priority road, give priority to all intersecting drivers.
options: Give priority to all drivers on the intersecting road

questions_en.feedback: You MUST stop here, and note! You are now driving onto a priority road, give priority to all intersecting drivers
options: STOP; give priority to the drivers on the intersecting road

questions_en.feedback: You may not drive here, but you may walk here as a pedestrian.
options: Closed for vehicles, riders and persons accompanying animals or livestock, in both directions

questions_en.feedback: You may not drive in from this side, very dangerous, go back immediately! You can expect traffic from the other side very soon.
options: One-way street, closed, in this direction, to vehicles, riders and persons accompanying animals or livestock + warning 'go back'

questions_en.feedback: You may not drive in from this side, but you may walk here as a pedestrian. And you may expect traffic from the other side.
options: One-way street, closed, in this direction, to vehicles, riders and persons accompanying animals or livestock.

questions_en.feedback: You are driving on a one-way street, you do not expect traffic to come from the other side. But you expect pedestrians!
options: One-way street, you may only drive in from this side.

questions_en.feedback: You must follow the direction of the arrow, this sign may only be used for going left or right.
You must follow the direction of the arrow, this sign may only be used for going left or right.
You are allowed to drive here, but note, you should expect oncoming traffic!
options: You are allowed to drive here

questions_en.feedback: Vehicles heavier than 3500 kg may not enter here.
options: Closed to trucks: motor vehicle, not equipped for the transport of persons, of which the maximum allowed mass exceeds 3500 kg

questions_en.feedback: You are not allowed to walk farther here.
You are not allowed to drive here on a motorcycle, but mopeds and 'snorfietsen' may keep on driving.
You may not drive in here if you are carrying a trailer behind your car or truck.
options: Closed to motor vehicles with trailers

questions_en.feedback: Coaches transporting more than 8 persons may not enter here.
options: Coach: a motor vehicle, designed for the transport of more than eight persons, not including the driver

questions_en.feedback: This road is closed to all vehicles with a motor and which can go faster than 25 kilometres per hour, except for (electric) bicycles.
Some trucks pollute the environment, often trucks with heavy and old engines. These are not allowed to continue on.
options: Closed to trucks that do not comply with the requirements, named in article 86d

questions_en.feedback: Cyclists, mopeds and disabled vehicles without auxiliary engines are not allowed to enter here.
options: Closed to cyclists, mopeds and disabled vehicles

questions_en.feedback: If your vehicle is wider than indicated on the sign, you may not enter here. - NOTE! The number on the sign can be different!
options: Closed to vehicles which are, including cargo, wider than indicated on the sign

questions_en.feedback: If your vehicle is higher than indicated on the sign, you may not enter here. - NOTE! The number on the sign can be different!
options: Closed to vehicles which are, including cargo, higher than indicated on the sign

questions_en.feedback: If your vehicle is longer than indicated on the sign, you may not enter here. - NOTE! The number on the sign can be different!
options: Closed to vehicles and compositions of vehicles which are, including cargo, longer than indicated on the sign

questions_en.feedback: If your axle load is heavier than indicated on the sign. That is not the entire weight of the car or truck, what matters is the amount of weight resting on one axle (set of wheels).
options: Closed to vehicles and compositions of vehicles which have a larger axle load than that indicated on the sign

questions_en.feedback: If your car or truck is heavier than indicated on the sign. - NOTE! The number on the sign can be different!
options: Closed to vehicles and compositions of vehicles which have a larger total mass than that indicated on the sign

questions_en.feedback: Cars or trucks transporting dangerous substances may not continue here. For dangerous substances, think: for example petrol and other flammable substances, or chemicals.
options: Closed to vehicles with certain dangerous substances.

questions_en.feedback: This is the end of the zone in which polluting trucks are not allowed to drive.
options: End of closure to trucks that do not meet the requirements indicated in article 86d

questions_en.feedback: Trucks and buses transporting more than 8 persons may not enter here.
You are driving on a roundabout, you MUST follow the direction of the arrows.
NOTE ! Obstacle on the road! You MUST pass the sign on the side the arrow indicates! There is often a yellow pole in the middle of the road at a crossing.
options: It is mandatory for all drivers to pass the sign on the side indicated by the arrows.

questions_en.feedback: NOTE ! Obstacle on the road! You MUST pass the sign on the side the arrow indicates! There is often a yellow pole in the middle of the road at a crossing.
options: It is mandatory for all drivers to pass the sign on the side indicated by the arrows.

questions_en.feedback: NOTE ! Obstacle on the road! You are allowed to choose which side you pass on! There is often a yellow pole in the middle of the road at a crossing.

questions_en.feedback: You cannot park here, only applies to the side of the road the sign is placed on. You are allowed to drop someone off here.
You cannot park or stand still here, only applies to the side of the road the sign is placed on. You aren't allowed to drop someone off here.
You cannot place mopeds, snorfietsen or bicycles here.
options: Forbidden to park / place bicycles or mopeds

questions_en.feedback: You are not allowed to park in this zone (including all side streets), applies to both sides of the road. You are allowed to drop someone off here.
You are allowed to park in this zone (including all side streets), applies to both sides of the road. You are allowed to drop someone off here.

options: End parking zone mopeds or bicycles
Repetition parking zone mopeds or bicycles

questions_en.feedback: Only snorscooters, scooters and mopeds may park here.
options: Parking space mopeds. Parking facility only intended for the vehicle category, or group of vehicles, indicated on the sign

questions_en.feedback: This is a public parking space for all kinds of vehicles.
You may only park here with an electric car, and you MUST connect the car to the charger.
options: Only cars connected with the charging point via a charging cable to charge are allowed to stand on the corresponding parking space.

questions_en.feedback: You may only park an electric car here.
options: The corresponding parking space is reserved for an electric vehicle (with a plug), but it doesn't need to be charging.

questions_en.feedback: Only taxis with an official taxi licence may park here.
options: Parking space taxi - Parking facility only intended for the vehicle category, or group of vehicles, indicated on the sign

questions_en.feedback: Parking space for someone with a permit. If you have a handicap or mobility problems, you get a parking permit for this sign.
options: Parking space disabled - Parking facility only intended for the vehicle category, or group of vehicles, indicated on the sign

questions_en.feedback: You may park here for a short time to pick up or drop off goods.
options: Parking space loading and unloading - Facility for the immediate loading and unloading of goods.

questions_en.feedback: Only cars may park in this parking space, so no buses able to transport more than 8 persons, trucks or motorcycles.
options: Parking space cars. Parking facility only intended for the vehicle category, or group of vehicles, indicated on the sign

options:
Parkeerplaats vrachtwagens en bussen. Parkeergelegenheid alleen bestemd voor voertuigcategorie,
of groep voertuigen, die op het bord is aangegeven

End of all advices and prohibitions indicated on electronic signalling panels.

options: Stop. This sign can indicate who or why the sign is applied

questions_en.feedback: End roadway or lane, exclusively for public transport buses and tram line. Forbidden to other drivers unless they are exempt, like, for example, taxis.
options: End bus lane or tram lane

questions_en.feedback: Roadway or lane, exclusively for public transport buses and freight transport. Forbidden to other drivers unless they are exempt, like, for example, taxis.
options: Mandatory roadway or lane, exclusively for trucks and public buses

questions_en.feedback: End roadway or lane, exclusively for public transport buses and freight transport. Forbidden to other drivers unless they are exempt, like, for example, taxis.
options: End mandatory roadway or lane for trucks and public buses

questions_en.feedback: Roadway or lane, exclusively for freight transport. Forbidden to other drivers unless they are exempt, like, for example, taxis.
options: Mandatory roadway or lane, exclusively for trucks

questions_en.feedback: End roadway or lane, exclusively for freight transport. Forbidden to other drivers unless they are exempt, like, for example, taxis.
options: End mandatory roadway or lane for trucks

You are now leaving a motorway, unless otherwise indicated you cannot go faster than 80 kilometres per hour.
You are now driving on an autoweg, unless otherwise indicated you cannot go faster than 100 kilometres per hour.

This indicates a mandatory bike path, if you are using a snorfiets, bicycle, snorscooter or moped, you must use this bike path.
This indicates the end of a mandatory bike path.
This indicates a mandatory bike/moped path, if you are on a snorfiets, bicycle, snorscootor or moped, you must use this bike path.
This indicates the end of the mandatory moped/bike path.

Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching a (sharp) right turn.
Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching a (sharp) left turn.
Note! Adjust your speed, you are approaching a (sharp) turn, which goes right first, then left.
Note! Adjust your speed, you are approaching a (sharp) turn, which goes left first, then right.
Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching a dangerous intersection, where you need to give priority to drivers from the right.
Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching a roundabout.

options: Warning beacon at 240 m before a railway crossing
Warning beacon at 240 m before a railway crossing

questions_en.feedback: Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching a controlled crossing. Pay attention to light and audio signals, and always be careful!

options: Parking space near restaurant; Follow arrow

questions_en.feedback: Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching an uncontrolled crossing. So, NO barriers Pay attention to light and audio signals, and always be careful!

options: Warning for level crossing with single track, no barriers (single Saltire)
Warning for level crossing with two or more tracks, no barriers (double Saltire)

questions_en.feedback: Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching a tram crossing. So, NO barriers Pay attention to light and audio signals, and always be careful!
Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching a moveable bridge. Pay attention to light and audio signals, and always be careful!
Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching a narrowing road with an obstacle on both sides of the road.
Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching a narrowing road with an obstacle on the right side of the road.
options: Warning for narrowing road on the right

questions_en.feedback: Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching a narrowing road with an obstacle on the left side of the road.
options: Warning for narrowing road on the left

questions_en.feedback: Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching a slippery road due to construction, oil or rain and suchlike. The reason is often indicated on a sign below the sign.
Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching an area where you can expect playing children. So no fixed crossing, is often used near schools or public playgrounds.
Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching a pedestrian crossing via a zebra crossing. If someone wants to cross, you HAVE to stop.
Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching a pedestrian crossing which is not demarcated with road lining.
Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching a crossing for cyclists and mopeds
Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching road with loose stones (gravel). This can be slippery, but also cause damage to oncoming or traffic behind you.
Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching a dangerous quay or riverbank without barrier or protection.
Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching a road where large game is likely to cross.
Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching a crossing for livestock and slow traffic
Note! adjust your speed, separate lanes are merging into a roadway for traffic in two directions.
Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching an area in which aircraft can fly over at low altitude. You are probably near an airport
Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching an area where dangerous cross winds can occur.
Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching an intersection or bridge with traffic lights, there might be a traffic jam.
Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching a zone where traffic jams may occur regularly.
Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching a location where an accident took place, there is a reasonable chance there might be a traffic jam
Note! adjust your speed in case of snow, rain or fog, you are approaching a location where poor visibility often occurs due to weather conditions, there is a reasonable chance on congestion.
options: Warning, poor visibility because of snow, rain or fog

questions_en.feedback: Note! adjust your speed in case of snow or black ice, you are approaching a location where the road surface often freezes due to weather conditions, there is a reasonable chance on congestion and danger of slipping.
Note! you adjust your speed, you are approaching a situation that requires extra attention. It is always explained on the sign below.
options: Warning, (the nature of the danger is indicated on the sign below)

questions_en.feedback: Note! adjust your speed, you are approaching a speed bump.

questions_en.question: Which part is known as the roadway?
questions_en.feedback:
The lanes you can drive on are collectively known as the roadway
B is the lane. The verge and emergency lane are also part of the road.

questions_en.question: Can you expect a brommobiel outside the built-up area?
questions_en.feedback: A brommobiel may drive within and outside of the built-up area, it is only not allowed on motorways or autoweg.

questions_en.question: Does a disabled vehicle fall in the pedestrian or driver's category?
questions_en.feedback: A disabled vehicle is allowed to determine which part of the road it wants to use. When a mobility scooter uses the pavement/sidewalk, it needs to follow pedestrian rules, also when crossing from one sidewalk to the next.
options: It depends on the space on the road the disabled vehicle takes up.

questions_en.question: You are no longer using your car and park it the through road in front of your house. Do you still need to pay road taxes?
questions_en.feedback: If the car is on a public road or visibly in the driveway of your house, you always need to pay road tax. If the car is in a closed garage, you can suspend the vehicle and will no longer need to pay road tax The license plate does not to be removed.

questions_en.question: Who is understood to be 'traffic'?
questions_en.feedback: Road users are everyone who participate in traffic.

questions_en.question: Is someone walking next to their horse a pedestrian or a driver?
questions_en.feedback: A rider walking next to their horse is still a driver: They fall under persons in charge of animals or livestock.

questions_en.question: What is the maximum speed you may go on this road?
questions_en.feedback: This sign means 'Autoweg': the maximum speed is 100 km/h.

questions_en.question: Can you refuse a breathalyser because of religious beliefs?
questions_en.feedback: Regardless of your faith, you must perform a breathalyser test when instructed by the police. You can refuse a test because of, for example, jaw surgery because you are unable to blow. You then need to cooperate to have your self tested (via blood or urine).

questions_en.question: What speed must you be able to at least go to use this road?
questions_en.feedback: Only motor vehicles capable of and allowed to drive at least 60 km/h are allowed on the motorway.

questions_en.question: Do you always need to have the green card with you?
questions_en.feedback: In the Netherlands, it is not mandatory to have the green card in the car. As soon as the vehicle is outside the Netherlands, it does become mandatory.

questions_en.question: How fast can you go here?
questions_en.feedback: There is a double axis line with interrupted side lines on the road, this means that you can go no faster than 80 km/h here.

questions_en.question: Can a brommobiel drive on the autoweg?
questions_en.feedback: A brommobiel may not drive on the autoweg or motorway, because they are not allowed nor able to drive faster than 45 km/h

questions_en.question: What is the maximum speed you may go after this sign?
questions_en.feedback: A maximum speed of 130 km/h is applicable on the motorway, unless otherwise specified.

questions_en.question: Is it wise to keep the ascription code in the glove compartment?
questions_en.feedback: It is wiser to not keep the ascription code in the car. When someone has this code, it is possible to register the car in their own name.

questions_en.question: Are you allowed to overtake someone here when driving on the right lane?
questions_en.feedback: You are allowed to overtake when there is an interrupted line on your side.

questions_en.question: How long is the 'green' insurance card valid?
questions_en.feedback: You sign an insurance for a length of 1 year, which is why the green card is valid for 1 year.

questions_en.question: Is a ditch part of the road?
questions_en.feedback: A ditch is not part of the road. A road goes from ditch to ditch or verge to verge.

questions_en.question: What rules does a brommobiel follow?
questions_en.feedback: The drivers and passengers in a brommobiel need to follow the rules for a car, unless otherwise determined.

questions_en.question: A handicapped person drives a brommobiel. Can they park on the sidewalk?
questions_en.feedback: A brommobiel must always follow the rules for a brommobiel, regardless of who is in the brommobiel. Even when the driver is handicapped, this vehicle does not automatically become a handicapped vehicle.

questions_en.question: Is someone walking next to their motorcycle a driver?
questions_en.feedback: When walking next to your bicycle, moped, snorfiets or motorcycle, you must follow the rules for pedestrians.

questions_en.question: When does a handicapped vehicle come under the rules for pedestrians?
questions_en.feedback: When a handicapped vehicle uses the pavement or a footpath, it must follow the rules for pedestrians.
options: When it is on the pavement or footpath
When it is on the road

questions_en.question: What is the maximum speed here?
questions_en.feedback: The 100 km/h road (autoweg) has uninterrupted side lines, double axis lines and, as the most noticeable feature, green filling between them. If the axis lines are uninterrupted (which is generally the case on 100 km/h roads) you are not allowed to overtake anyone.

questions_en.question: You want to move a trailer that's heavier than the empty weight of your car. What driving licence do you need?
questions_en.feedback: To transport a trailer heavier than the pulling vehicle, you need driving licence BE or B+.

questions_en.question: Vanaf welke leeftijd kun je je rijbewijs B behalen?
questions_en.feedback: Je kunt je praktijkexamen behalen zodra je 17 jaar bent.

questions_en.question: You are younger than 18 and have a to2drive driving licence. You want to drive under the guidance of someone who happens to be a qualified driving instructor. Does that person need a supervisor pass?
questions_en.feedback: A supervisor of a youth below 18 with a 2toDrive licence needs a supervisor pass. Even when the supervisor is a qualified driving instructor.

questions_en.question: Novice drivers can lose the novice driving licence, on top of the existing punishment and/or fine, if they exceed the allowed maximum speed by more than ........
questions_en.feedback: If drivers with a novice licence drive more than 50 km/h too fast, they can lose their licence.

questions_en.question: What is the validity of driving licence B?
questions_en.feedback: If you are younger than 65, your driving licence is valid for 10 years.

questions_en.question: Can you show the police a copy of your driving licence or registration card?
questions_en.feedback: Copies of your driving licence or registration are not allowed. You are supposed to have the original papers with you.

questions_en.question: How long is your driving licence valid if you are 70?
questions_en.feedback: After your 75th birthday, you need an annual medical check-up to extend your passport.

questions_en.question: How long is the theory certificate valid?
questions_en.feedback: The theory certificate is valid for 1.5 years. You need to have done your practical exam within this time, or else the certificate expires.

questions_en.question: Can you start your driving lessons before you earned the theoretical certificate?
questions_en.feedback: You can start with driving lessons without a theory certificate, you only need this during the intermediate test. It is wise to have some knowledge of the theory beforehand.

questions_en.question: At what age are you allowed to take the theoretical exam?
questions_en.feedback: You can start doing the theoretical exam for the driving licence from 16 years old.

questions_en.question: You have received your driving licence when you were 17, and want to drive with a friend who is also 17. He also already has driving licence B. Are you allowed to drive like this?
questions_en.feedback: When you are younger than 18 years old, you may only drive with a supervisor / coach next to you. Among other things, they need to be older than 27.

questions_en.question: Are you allowed to drive an automatic with a driving licence for a manual car?
questions_en.feedback: The driving licence for the manual car is also valid for an automatic. This is not the case the other way around.

questions_en.question: You have driving licence B. Are you allowed to transport a 1750 kg trailer using a car that weighs 2000 kg?
questions_en.feedback: With a driving licence B, the combination of the pulling vehicle and trailer may not be more than 3500 kg. In the case above, the total is 3750 kg, which is too much.

questions_en.question: How much is the allowed maximum mass of a car and trailer that you are allowed to drive with driving licence B?
questions_en.feedback: With driving licence B, it is allowed to transport a trailer that is heavier than 750 kg, but the empty weight and loading capacity of the trailer and the car together may not be more than 3500 kg. The trailer may also not be heavier than the pulling motor vehicle.

questions_en.question: Which vehicles have this sign on the back?
questions_en.feedback: Agricultural and forestry tractors (including their trailers) need to place a 'red retro-reflector shaped like a triangle' on the backside of the vehicle.

questions_en.question: How many persons are you allowed to transport with driving licence B?
questions_en.feedback: With driving licence B, you are allowed to transport up to 8 people in a van designed to do so (excluding the driver). If the van is designed for the transport of more than 8 persons, you need driving licence D.

questions_en.question: What driving licence do you need to drive a brommobiel?
questions_en.feedback: You need driving licence AM to drive a brommobiel.

questions_en.question: Are you allowed to drive a mobility scooter, moped or snorfiets with driving licence B?
questions_en.feedback: If you have driving licence B, you are allowed to drive mopeds and snorfietsen. If you do not, you need driving licence AM.

questions_en.question: Are you obligated to attach extra mirrors when pulling a trailer or caravan?
questions_en.feedback: If an attached trailer obscures the rear view via the normal mirrors, you need additional mirrors.

questions_en.question: You want to transport a long, indivisible load on top of your car, how far is that load allowed to protrude from the front?
questions_en.feedback: Only indivisible loads are allowed to protrude at the front, but no more than 1 metre.

questions_en.question: Are you allowed to transport the load in this manner?
questions_en.feedback: When transporting loose components like gravel, the cargo needs to be covered well. You can do this using, for example, a large tarpaulin.

questions_en.question: The cargo protrudes 40 cm on both sides, can you drive like this?
questions_en.feedback: A car's load may never protrude more than 20 cm on both sides, whereby a load protruding more than 10 cm needs to be marked.

questions_en.question: Hoe ver mag ondeelbare lading uitsteken vanaf de achterste as van de auto?
questions_en.feedback: Ondeelbare lading bv. een ladder, mag maximaal 5 meter uitsteken vanaf de achterste as van het voertuig. Lading die meer dan 1 meter uitsteekt moet voorzien zijn van een vierkant bord van 50 x 50 cm met rode en witte strepen.

questions_en.question: What is the maximum amount of metres there can be between your vehicle and the towed vehicle?
questions_en.feedback: The distance between vehicles towing each other may not be more than 5 metres.

questions_en.question: You are driving with a trailer. Does this have an effect on the visibility of the lights of your car?
questions_en.feedback: A trailer can block the visibility of the rear lights of your car. That is why it is mandatory to have lights on the trailer itself.

questions_en.question: The cargo protrudes more than 1 metre and is marked with red flags. Is this allowed?
questions_en.feedback: When something is marked with something besides the official marking sign, it is wrong by default..

questions_en.question: Divisible cargo is protruding from the front of the vehicle, is that allowed?
questions_en.feedback: Divisible cargo is never allowed to protrude from the front of the vehicle.

questions_en.question: What characterises the marking sign for cargo?
questions_en.feedback: The official marking sign has diagonal red and white stripes and is 42 by 42 centimetres.

questions_en.question: What depends if you are allowed to pull a trailer?
questions_en.feedback: The combination of the weight of the trailer and the car decide what driving licence you need to transport them.

questions_en.question: The cargo protrudes 75 cm from the back of your trailer. Do you need to mark it?
questions_en.feedback: Marking is only necessary if the cargo protrudes more than 1 metre from the back of the trailer, if no sharp parts are sticking out.

questions_en.question: Are you allowed to drive on the 3rd lane here?
questions_en.feedback: When choosing the proper lane for your turn, you may use the 3rd lane. As soon as there are multiple lanes, you need to keep right as much as possible.

questions_en.question: Are cars, or cars with trailers , that are longer than 7 metres overtake using the left lane on the motorway?
questions_en.feedback: Combinations longer than 7 metres are not allowed to overtake using the left lane.

questions_en.question: Are cars, or cars with trailers , that are longer than 7 metres use the left lane on the motorway?
questions_en.feedback: Trucks and motor vehicles with a trailer that are longer than 7 metres may not use the third lane. An exception to this rule is when pre-sorting.

questions_en.question: What is the function of the tachometer?
questions_en.feedback: The tachometer informs you regarding the amount of revolutions the engine is on, you switch to the next gear when the tachometer is somewhere between 2000 and 3000 revolutions. The speedometer indicates your speed.
options: You use it to tell when to switch gears
You know how fast you're driving

questions_en.question: Your car and trailer are 7,20 metres combined. Are you allowed to drive in the left lane?
questions_en.feedback: When the car or combination of car and trailer are longer than 7 metres, you are only allowed to use the left lane for sorting.

questions_en.question: The trailer is 3 metres long. The indivisible cargo is marked with this sign and protrudes 1.20 metres. Is this allowed?
questions_en.feedback: You are only allowed to use this official marking sign when transporting cargo that protrudes more than 1 metre at the back of the car or trailer.

questions_en.question: From what weight does a trailer need its own licence plate?
questions_en.feedback: If the trailer is heavier than 750 kg, it needs to have its own licence plate, meaning a different licence plate than the car.

questions_en.question: Does a bike carrier need a licence plate?
questions_en.feedback: A bike carrier needs a (white) licence plate (copy of the car). The licence plate of the car is otherwise not properly visible.

questions_en.question: What trailer weighs less than 750 kg and has the licence plate of the car?
questions_en.feedback: The trailer with the white licence plate is a copy of the yellow licence plate on the car. The yellow licence plate on the trailer has a different number than the licence plate on the car, this means that it weighs more than 750 kg.

questions_en.question: Cargo is not allowed to protrude more than ... cm on the sides
questions_en.feedback: Cargo is allowed to protrude no more than 20 cm on both sides of the car. When it protrudes more than 10 cm on the side, it needs to be marker with the marking sign, not with flags!

questions_en.question: You have an old car that originally doesn't have a right door mirror. You want to drive without this right door mirror, is that allowed?
questions_en.feedback: The inside mirror and the left door mirror are mandatory. You are allowed to drive without a right door mirror if it concerns a car built before 2010.

questions_en.question: You have bought a new car. You want to drive without this right door mirror, is that allowed?
questions_en.feedback: Cars from 2010 need a right door mirror.

questions_en.question: You want to drive without a licence plate on your trailer, is that allowed?
questions_en.feedback: You are legally obligated to place a licence plate on the trailer.

questions_en.question: Your car weighs 2000 kg. You have driving licence B. What is the maximum weight that your trailer and the load can weigh now?
questions_en.feedback: the maximum allowed mass of a pulling vehicle and the load thereof consists of 3500 kg, so 2000 kg + 1500 kg = 3500 kg.

questions_en.question: The odometer is broken. Are you allowed to drive like this?
questions_en.feedback: The odometer does not necessarily have to work. Naturally, the speedometer does.

questions_en.question: Divisible cargo is protruding 1.5 m from the front of the vehicle, are you allowed to drive like that?
questions_en.feedback: For a divisible and indivisible load, a protrusion of 1.5 metres on the front of the car is too much. A divisible load is not allowed to protrude past the frame of the car. An indivisible load is allowed to protrude 1 metre past the front of the car.

questions_en.question: Are you allowed to pull a trailer with driving licence B?
questions_en.feedback: With driving licence B, you are allowed to pull a trailer up to 750 kg. When the trailer is heavier than 750 kg, the total maximum allowed weight of the combination car and trailer is 3500 kg.

questions_en.question: What trailers are you allowed to pull with driving licence B?
questions_en.feedback: When the combination of car and trailer weighs more than 3500 kg, you need driving licence B+ or BE.

questions_en.question: Your car and trailer are 6.90 metres combined. Are you allowed to use the left lane?
questions_en.feedback: If the combination of car and trailer is less than 7 metres, you are allowed to use all lanes.

questions_en.question: The right door mirror is damaged. Are you allowed to drive like this?
questions_en.feedback: You are not allowed to drive with a damaged mirror.

questions_en.question: Does a trailer need to have lights?
questions_en.feedback: A trailer has to have lights.

questions_en.question: What do you do if the warning lamp for the engine glows red?
questions_en.feedback: Red means stop, orange means stop if possible (to the garage as soon as possible)

questions_en.question: Do you need to have the APK report with you when driving?
questions_en.feedback: Since July 2008, you are no longer obligated to have the report with you when driving. In some European countries you might be asked for it, so don't throw it away.

questions_en.question: How deep must a car's tyre profile minimally be?
questions_en.feedback: The profile on a car tyre must be at least 1.6 mm. If the profile is less deep, the tires are worn out and need to be replaced.

questions_en.question: What tyre gives you the least chance on aquaplaning?
questions_en.feedback: The winter tyre gives you the least chance of aquaplaning, among other things, because of the deeper profile, which is better capable of handling the water.

questions_en.question: Can you use cruise control to save on gas?
questions_en.feedback: You use cruise control to keep your speed constant, which means that you don't have to keep applying the gas and braking again, which can help you save fuel - for example, you don't need use the accelerator when you've slowed down a little unnoticed.

questions_en.question: Can you refill the oil while the engine is running?
questions_en.feedback: This is severely discouraged. If you open the tank cap while the engine is running, there is a change that hot oil will spray out (90 degrees) which could hit you. This could give you severe burns.

questions_en.question: You are driving. The symbol of the battery lights up. The colour of the symbol is yellow. What is the best thing to do now?
questions_en.feedback: A yellow or orange symbol gives a warning, it is likely there is a small problem and you will still be able to drive to the garage. It is best to immediately stop in case of a red symbol, and to have the problem fixed as soon as possible.
options: Go to the garage and have it checked

questions_en.question: After how many years must a petrol-fuelled car be APK tested?
questions_en.feedback: A petrol-fuelled car must be APK tested after 4 years, then in the sixth year and then in the eighth year. After that year, every year. Mnemonic device: 4-2-2-1.

questions_en.question: Welke band heeft de juiste spanning?
questions_en.feedback: Band 1 heeft een te lage bandenspanning, hierdoor wordt er meer brandstof verbruikt. Band 2 heeft het beste contact met het wegdek; de kans is o.a. kleiner dat je slipt. Band 3 heeft een te hoge bandenspanning, waardoor je minder grip kunt hebben op het wegdek.

questions_en.question: Does a car need to be APK tested if you are going to drive it on the road?
questions_en.feedback: When it is time to test a car APK, you are obligated to do so. A car must always be APK tested before you use it on public roads.

questions_en.question: When is it wise to turn on your low beam lights?
questions_en.feedback: It is always wise to have your low beam lights on. It is mandatory between dusk and dawn, but it is wise to have your low beam lights on during the day as well.
options: When there is less daylight because of trees along the road

questions_en.question: What colour is the symbol for turning on the high beam lights?
questions_en.feedback: The symbol on the dashboard denoting high beam lights is blue.

questions_en.question: What is the minimum profile depth of winter tyres?
questions_en.feedback: The minimum profile depth for winter tyres is 4 mm. This is deeper than a regular tyre, because you need extra grip on the road surface in bad weather.

questions_en.question: What kind of tyre is this?
questions_en.feedback: M&S stands for 'Mud & Snow'. This says nothing regarding the specific summer or winter features of the tyre. The manufacturer can decide on which tyre he puts the M&S logo, so it can be a winter, summer or all-season tyre.

questions_en.question: Does ABS generally make the braking distance shorter?
questions_en.feedback: ABS can make the braking distance shorter, because the system helps you keeping the vehicle under control, for example when you brake in a turn.

questions_en.question: Does the speedometer always need to be lit up in the dark?
questions_en.feedback: You must always be able to read the speedometer.

questions_en.question: Are winter tyres obligated in the Netherlands?
questions_en.feedback: In the Netherlands, you are not obligated to have winter tyres under your vehicle during the winter months.

questions_en.question: Does this light mean that the airbag is on?
questions_en.feedback: This means that there is a disruption in the airbag system. If the light is orange, the airbag is off

questions_en.question: You have an old car that drives on petrol. How often doe you need to have it APK tested?
questions_en.feedback: An old petrol-fuelled (older than 8 years) car needs to be APK tested every year.

questions_en.question: At what temperature do you switch to winter tyres?
questions_en.feedback: Below 7 degrees Celsius, it is wise to exchange the summer tyres for winter tyres.

questions_en.question: If you are driving, this symbol appears on your dashboard. What does this mean?
questions_en.feedback: If the symbol is red, it indicates that the oil level is too low. It is therefore advisable to refill the motor oil as soon as possible, because it could otherwise cause damage.

questions_en.question: If you are driving, this symbol appears on your dashboard. What does this mean?
questions_en.feedback: When this symbol glows red, something could be wrong with, for example, the dynamo. Have this checked as soon as possible, or buy jumper cables, because you are going to need them!
options: Electric problem in the car's engine

questions_en.question: This symbol appears on your dashboard. The colour is red. What is the best thing to do now?
questions_en.feedback: If the symbol glows red, the best thing is to stop as soon as possible (if that doesn't happen by itself).
options: Go to the garage and have it checked

questions_en.question: After how many years must a hybrid car first be APK tested?
questions_en.feedback: A hybrid car must be, like a petrol-fuelled car, first be APK tested within the first 4 years.

questions_en.question: After how many years must a car fuelled by diesel or gas first be APK tested?
questions_en.feedback: A car fuelled by diesel or gas must first be tested after 3 years, and every year after that.

questions_en.question: After how many years must an electric car first be APK tested?
questions_en.feedback: An electric car must first be tested after 4 years, after that in year 6 and in year 8, and if the car is 8 years or older it needs to be tested every year.

questions_en.question: What does ABS do?
questions_en.feedback: ABS ensures, through phased braking, that the vehicle is less likely to lose grip on the road surface.
options: ABS ensures, through phased braking, that the wheels do not block and braking in turns is possible.
ABS ensures a correct division of the braking balance over the two wheels. This makes sure that you can brake in turns

questions_en.question: What type of tyre is this?
questions_en.feedback: You can recognize the winter tyre by its snowflake symbol

questions_en.question: What are the green and blue stripes on a new tyre for?
questions_en.feedback: As soon as the tyres are used for driving, the coloured stripes disappear from the tyre and you'll know that the tyre has been used before.
options: To show that the tyre is new
To indicate the turning direction of the tyre
To indicate the left or right sides for the garage

questions_en.question: What type of tyre is this?
questions_en.feedback: This is a 4-seasons tyre/all-seasons tyre. It says so in big letters.

questions_en.question: When is it best to check the oil level?
